libnetworkd::NameResolver

libnetworkd::NameResolver Class Reference

#include <NameResolution.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void nameResolved (string name, list< string > addresses, NameResolutionStatus status)=0

Detailed Description

The abstract definition of an entity, which wants to resolve names (more specifically wants to receive notifactions about the results of a name resolution).

Member Function Documentation

virtual void libnetworkd::NameResolver::nameResolved ( string  name,
list< string >  addresses,
NameResolutionStatus  status 
) [pure virtual]

Event notification callback, normally called by a NameResolvingFacility, to inform the implementing class about the result of a resultion.

Parameters:
[in] name The name which was resolved (or failed to resolve).
[in] address The address the name was resolved to, if successful. NULL otherwise.
[in] Length of the resolved address or 0 on failure.
[in] status Status indicating the success of the query.
